name: Rowan

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally ACC in Faction Crypts by 50

skills.name: Slash
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns. Damage increases according to SPD.
Damage based on: [ATK] [SPD]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Scourge
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 3 times at random. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Blade Surge
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 4 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

seo.description: Banner-Lords is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 33 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Hereditary Knights of Kaerok, the Banner Lords swear blindallegiance to King Tayba. His majesty has tasked them withwaging his war of expansion, and protecting the royaladministrators posted at Kaerok Castle. These fearsome knightswill let no soul pass without a royal scroll.

seo.description: Rowan is a epic attack champion from the faction Banner-Lords doing void damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.
